NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Bending, folding, straightening or flattening machines
Machine tools for drilling, boring or milling metal

SHORT_DESCR.P: Supply, delivery, installation, commissioning and training provision of Metal Fabrication Equipment consisting of the following items which will be used for teaching and learning in an educational environment by multiple, unskilled users:
— MIG/MAG Multi process Welding Plant (ARC/MIG Welding Workshop) including:
—— AC/DC TIG Welding Plant (TIG Workshop & Fabrication Workshop),
—— 200mm CNC Horizontal Bender Machine and Tooling Waterjet Profile Cutting Machine,

TITLE.P: 200mm CNC Horizontal Bender Machine and Tooling

INFO_ADD.P: No award given, machine spec changed.

ACCELERATED_PROC.P: — The new courses are starting in September 2017, the equipment that is being tendered is needed for these courses. I was waiting on confirmation from OGP and then EPS to advise was CIT to run the tender or would it be managed by either OGP or EPS.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.ADDRESS: Portgate Business Park, Ringaskiddy, Co Cork

TITLE.P: 200mm CNC Horizontal Bender Machine and Tooling

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.ADDRESS: Unit C2 Binary Court, Matrix Park, Western Avenue
